resources.string: Please enter Email and Birth Date and click on \"Send Reset Password Link\" button.
Please provide details below to create your new Medlynk account
A confirmation email is sent to you
Medlynk will assist you in providing information to your doctor.
On the next screen, you will be able to search for your doctor\'s account. Don\'t worry if you can\'t find their account number, you will still be able to use Medlynk. We\'ll guide you through this.
Go to question set already in progress
Or select a doctor identification number (ID) that you searched before:
I DON\'T KNOW MY DOCTOR ID
In preparation for your doctor appointment, please select an option below that most closely matches the reason for your visit

This questionnaire will collect some important background information from you regarding any medication you need a refill for. You will be prompted to complete it once for EACH medication that you need refilled.
What if I have more to discuss?
What if none of the options are suitable for my appointment?

Using the button below you can still access all the question sets, and fill in your responses. At the end, you will have the option to PRINT your information. You will need a printer on your local network to do this.

Once you have printed your information, bring this with you to your doctor appointment, and provide the printout to reception as soon as you arrive. Although we cannot make any guarantees, the vast majority of offices will take your printout, and your doctor will have the opportunity to review this before beginning your visit.
When you print your information, it will not only show your responses, but also a medical style note that is formatted in a way that is easy for your doctor to review.
Got it! Next time when I click on the link \"I don\'t know my doctor ID\", skip the current page.
What is the main symptom that is concerning you today?
